content.prompt: Lin’s design called for polished black granite because

choices.label: those who funded the work required its use
the stone is used in most contemporary monuments
its reflective quality contributes to the monument’s meaning
its durability symbolizes the hardships of the Vietnam War

topic.text: 10.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
